taxon.author: Tikader, 1962
taxon.distribution: Tropical Africa. Introduced to Brazil, India, Laos, Taiwan, Japan, Australia (Queensland)

referenceObject.reference: Tikader, B. K. (1962a). Studies on some spiders of the genus Oecobius (family Oecobiidae) from India. Journal of the Bombay Natural History Society 59: 682-685.
